amendment.description: An amendment numbered 51 printed in House Report 115-297 to prohibit funds to authorize, permit, or conduct geological or geophysical activities in support of oil, gas, or methane and hydrate exploration and development in the North Atlantic, Mid-Atlantic, South Atlantic or the Straits of Florida.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Sanford amendment (A083) Failed by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Sanford amendment (A083) Failed by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A083) offered by Mr. Sanford.
